attributes.action: Make more steps to eliminate the widespread misconceptions about Islam which are encouraging racism and "Islamaphobia".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It appears that we have come to a time in which it is unacceptable to be prejudice against African-Americans, Christians, Jews and so on however it acceptable by many people in today’s society to be racist against Muslims. This is because of the negative portrayal of certain Muslim populated cultures and presented as a factual package about Islam. The true fact of the matter is that Islam is misunderstood by everyone excluding a small handful of Scholars. The true experts should be consulted on matters pertaining to Islam rather than the use misconceived opinions of people within the media.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
